t: G.E. in Deal To Acquire Roper - The New York Times
s: April 1, 1988 - Under the agreement, G.E. will acquire Roper's manufacturing capacity for stoves and lawn equipment, while Whirlpool will get the Roper name for major appliances. G.E. will supply Whirlpool with electric and gas ranges for the Roper brand for at least two years.

t: Roper Corporation- LaFayette, GA
s: January 9, 2025 - Roper Corporation is an appliance manufacturer and wholly-owned subsidiary of GE Appliances, a Haier company. Roper is the largest employer in Walker County, and one of the largest employers in northwest Georgia with more than 2,000 employees.

t: About Roper Corporation - Roper Corporation
s: June 4, 2024 - Roper produces some of America's best cooking products, with more than 300 new appliances (from free-standing electric ranges to wall ovens to cooktops in a variety of finishes and designs) launched over the last two years. The plant produces cooking products for the Monogram®, GE®, GE Profile™ and CAFÉ™ brands...

t: GE Appliances announces $118 million investment at Roper - GE Appliances Corporate
s: GE Appliances (GEA), a Haier company, is investing more than $118 million to grow its cooking appliances business by expanding capacity and developing new cooking products at its wholly owned subsidiary Roper Corporation in LaFayette, Ga. The expansion will add more than 600 new jobs by the ...

t: How good are Roper brand appliances? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 11): I don't do reviews but I have been so happy every time I do laundry and I don't have to wash again. Our GE was a piece of junk from the time we got it. I thought I must be doing something wrong but nope. Just didn't clean unless I washed 3 times. After It drove me to frustration...
